name: Nathan Wise
text: We found the representative to be nice, but didn’t seem to be able to answer my brother in laws questions with confidence. I checked out the sheds…they looked nice, but told told him to pass. It looked like particle board that was used. These things are an investment as they are very expensive, and I just don’t believe that these sheds will last the test of time.

name: Kolby Smythe
text: My family has been in the construction business for over 30 years and I can say that these buildings will absolutely stand the test of time. No other shed company we looked into could back their buildings with a written lifetime warranty as well. Our HOA was also very impressed with their quality, had no issues at all getting it approved.

resp.text: Kolby, we're so glad you were able to quickly get it approved with your HOA. We do pride ourselves on building something that lasts. Thanks so much for your kind review!

name: Ralph Scoggins
text: Nick was super easy to work with and made the sales process painless. I would definitely buy another shed from Cook.

name: Ted Taylor
text: Save yourself a trip and avoid this place at all costs. Their fees on the rent 2 own is nothing but a rip off, and the shed is ok at best. Nothing special, unless you like exorbitantly overpaying.

name: George Masey
text:
I stopped by this place wanting to compare quality/prices.
Honestly, I never got to the point of pricing them because the build quality was so terrible. They used some type of fiber board for the siding and OSB fir the flooring. I’ve never seen such terrible choices if materials. This thing would rot out in a few years.

name: Johnnie Ferguson
text:
We drove by a total of 3 times and nobody has ever come to help us.

When we left and called on the phone, all they wanted to do was give rent to own monthly payments.

I’ve never done anything in a rent to own in my life, and am not going to start now.

Not to mention non existent customer service.

Can you say, rip off company!

name: Jack Wodock
text: Cook is clearly the highest quality building in the business. Buying any other is a big step down

name: Alfred Williams
text: I got my wife a she-shed here. Best thing I've done for us in years.

name: Rashad Williams
text: Shed seemed way to expensive for what you get. Dude was ok, but those rent to own payments were ridiculously high.

name: Christopher Dill
text: Very easy to deal with, didn't feel pressured into buying anything. Customer service was great, delivery took a while but totally worth the wait.

name: Brenda Hughes
text: Repo or 45% on a refinance during a pandemic because of a missed/late payment?? Absolutely disgusting.

name: Jody Johnson
text:
We’ve driven by a total of 3 times...and all 3 times either no one was there, or no one would come out to help us.

We did browse around at the sheds they had on site. Frankly we were not impressed as they look like they were made of particle board. We had a house in Montgomery made of Masonite years ago, and the stuff they are using reminds me of that.

I was not impressed with this company at all, and recommended anyone to look elsewhere!

name: Christina Dunn
text: My Husband and I visited Cooks portable building on July 18 2020 . After looking at Several we finally chose a 8× 10 Lofted Barn .The Salesman was Very Nolagable in helping us decide .We Signed our Contract and made a Deposit of 100.00 and went on our way planning for our she'd to Arrive in maybe a month .On Monday the 20th I received a call from the Salesman letting me know he made a mistake and our she'd had to be Custom built but I also needed to pay another 100.00 for , Okay I'm okay with that ! I received a Email from Corporate on August 14th that I have a Scheduled Delivery for Either September the 7th or the 14th .I contacted Corporate Today September 9th to see if our She'd is on Schedule ,I was Told it was being Built 🤔.It has been almost 3 months and I still have no shed and don't know when I will receive it .Be prepared to wait on your shed or use another company .If I don't receive my shed by the 18th of September I will not be needing the one I ordered .

name: Martha Sheldon
text: Extremely predatory lending practices. Buyer beware and then just go somewhere else.

name: Ryan Masterson
text: 45% apr for a refinance or repossession of the building when the customer was sick during the pandemic and asked for an extension on the payment. Unprofessional and sickening.

name: Elsie Jordan
text: You don’t get to just take things from people because they are down on their luck and 45% refinancing!?!? That is price gouging. Do not take your business here.

name: Debra Miller
text: Very kind and respectful people

resp.text: Thank you Debra so much for your kind review!

name: George Massey
text: I did business with this company and they were legit. I would buy from them again.

name: Ean Ross
text: I didn’t see where the sales rep was professional at all. It looked like they used OSB on the walls. I  can’t imagine that stuff lasting a long time. For the prices they asked, I figured they’d offer Hardi Plank or something much longer lasting.

name: Emily Burnside
text:
The sheds don’t look bad from the outside. On the inside is when I was very disappointed. Homemade doors like on a wooden fence and my daddy called it chipped board siding. My daddy bought a shed from Cooks in Valdosta in the 80’s when I was a little girl, but he said his was much better built then than these are now.

Also, me and my husband have great credit, and they have no financing options that we saw at all. Only options were for people with bad credit.

Due to these reasons we didn’t buy from this business, and couldn’t recommend others to buy from them either.

name: Melissa Cooper
text: Do yourself a favor and go somewhere else. The other 1 star reviews are legit.  I called, very rude man. Glad I didn't pursue a purchase. My neighbor, who initially referred me to this company, is totally being screwed on their rent to own.

name: Victoria Cooley
text: I enjoyed working with this local business. Great and reliable people.

name: Famous Nate
text: Nick was super easy to deal with, found a killer shed to turn into an outdoor "mini bar" next to our pool. Thanks again! We'll definitely be back when we move on to our next venture!

name: Perry Mack
text: You couldn’t give to me these cheap sheds. Pressed board siding and sky high prices!

name: Jerome Stinson
text: Reasonable price and easy to deal with

name: Ron Caudill
text: Local sales rep (Nick) is great, building quality is great, delivery and corporate support not so great.   I ordered a building on 1/31/19.   I've taken two days off work to meet the delivery person, only to have them cancel a couple hours ahead of time.  Last cancellation was last Wednesday 3/13/19.   I asked Tim Cook when it would be delivered and the answer I get is he can't tell me, he has no idea.   Finally the local rep Nick found out it is scheduled for 3/25/19  Who knows if they will meet that.  If I can find a building somewhere else that can be delivered before then I'm cancelling the Cook building.  It has been sitting on the lot in Phenix City for two weeks now, they just can't get it delivered.     I was offered a solution, I could hire and pay for an outside source to deliver it.    If you can live with a you get when you get it attitude, then consider these guys.  If you need a building by a certain date, I wouldn't recommend Cooks.

name: Mike Hutton
text: I can’t ever find anyone here. Not to mention it looks like all their buildings are made of particle board. Not impressed at all!

name: Paul Ford
text: I wasn’t impressed with their product, or lack of professionalism.

name: Dominic Marchio
text: Excellent construction and friendly customer service!

name: Rebecca Law
text: Buildings Plus has closed. No longer in business. There's a landscaping company there now. McKracken Landscaping.

name: Taylor Wall
text: Customer for life!!! From start to finish they made buying a new shed simple & easy. They delivered my new shed and had it set & level faster than I thought. The quality & craftsmanship of my new shed is excellent as well. Best prices, best terms on a rent to own, & best of all they are a Christian family owned business. If your in the market for a new shed or larger building, go here first.

name: michael price
text: Friendly staff. Just a hard place to find

name: Tom Katt
text: Thanks for the great service 😀

name: Tammie Johnston
text: I love this place. I keep coming back. They are always cheerful happy and helpful. I am always happy when I leave. I will go back to them verry soon.

name: Darron Park
text: He missed a sale maybe two no one there sign read open waited long time

name: Enrique Gomez
text: GREAT prices and Awesome Customer Service!

name: Calm Delinquent
text: Super friendly helps with your budget highly recommended

name: Lindsey Dilworth
text: Wonderful place! Ordered a metal shed and the man was so kind and organized getting our order placed and shed delivered. Will use them again. Highly recommend!

name: Jordan Dilworth
text: We bought a shed from here. It was super easy, Calvin was very helpful in offering assistance. If there's not a shed there, they will order you one. They offer financing as well.

name: juan c zamora
text: Hurricane certified sheds 200 mph and certified Barns they have awesome displays like nothing I’ve seen in this are !!!

resp.text: Simply the best!!!!

name: William Chausse
text: Responded quickly to my question,

resp.text: Thank you William

name: Marco Cox
text: Awesome strong structures, so many colors and designs to choose from and Mark helped me figure it all out. Love my barn for my horses. Thank you Baldwin Barns.

name: lauren lauing
text: best sheds and buildings in the south eastern U.S

resp.text: Thank you for five stars ⭐️ Luaren That’s awesome 🤩

name: Oleg B
text: be aware of this business stay away, they got my 2800 deposit, with no disclosures or terms about cancellation or holding deposit, they are holding deposits illegally, now after a few month they hold my deposit they are saying they cannot refund me my money back, email, and contract was rerecorded and will file a claim at the court house, got some meetings with some attorneys and they find some illegally operation stuff, be aware walk away  !!!! will let you update after the court claim will be closed

resp.text: Oleg why don’t you say we built your garage waited for you to pull your permits and then you don’t want to get permits your in a commercial area and we won’t build illegally like you want so that being said you should mention that in your review now we got to eat that garage that was made custom just for YOU !!!!!

name: Shontaea Heard
text: The staff there is awesome. From Trevor the office sales person to the delivery drivers. They always keep alot of units on the lot but mostly everyone of them had a sold sign on them. However,  Trevor advised me what they had coming in and showed me the colors as well as the pictures. There customer service was awesome they went over and beyond to make sure they communicated with me before they left the lot with my unit and when they arrived at my home. Even though they arrived at my home before my daughter got there and they waited but advised me the information on what the cost if they redeliver. I have to say is that the patience and customer service was outstanding and I will continue to do business with them.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your experience Ms. Heard. Customer service is our top priority. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again.

name: Katie Bush
text: I didn’t see anything here that I’d want to look at in my backyard. I work too hard to see an ugly metal shed when I’m drinking coffee in the morning. Not to mention they really hardly have anything to look at.

resp.text:
Katie,

Thank you for your feedback. We agree in that what we offer is an affordable option for those looking for a quality aluminum shed at a great price. We understand this is not for everyone. We would advise going to H&H for more custom finish options that they custom build if this is the style you desire.

Be Blessed!

- Thrifty Buildings

name: John Midkiff
text: Trevor in the office is very helpful and informative on what best satisfies our needs. Luke came out to the possible location of the building to make sure that the unit we wanted would fit due to it not being accessible from the driveway, extremely courteous and helpful... second unit purchased from Thrifty !! Definitely Recommend !!

resp.text: Thanks John. We appreciate your business and the kind words. Thank you for being a loyal customer. Let us know if you need anything additional from us.

name: Chad Summers
text: Very little to no selection of sheds. We found a much better selection and price at Premier Buildings’s.

name: Max Walsh
text: When we went here looking for a garden shed, there was hardly no inventory to choose from. Not to mention where I’m from in Massachusetts we would never build a shed that cheaply.

resp.text: Sorry for your experience. Our inventory is low because buildings are selling faster than our manufacturer can build them for us. We are happy to order a building for you. If you do not like the quality of the building, we hope you find something that satisfies you elsewhere. Good luck.

name: Renaye Perry
text: The staff at Thrifty was nice, professional and efficient. Thanks for your excellent service. 🙂

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words. We appreciate your business.

name: Bruce Macpherson
text: Love my new shed! The delivery guys were  excellent and installed it without any problems!

resp.text: Thanks Bruce. Enjoy your new portable building. Come see us when that one is full!!

name: Clarence Kendrick
text: I went to the lot expecting to find a large selection, and quite frankly I didn’t see where they had much of anything to choose from. The salesmen was nice, but frankly I’m not interested.

resp.text: We appreciate the feedback. Due to increased demand and shortages in supply, it has been difficult for us to keep stock buildings on our lots. Most of our building loads are pre-sold when they arrive. We are happy to order you a building if you are still interested. We have the best quality buildings you can buy. Call and ask for Trevor.

name: Shekita McGary
text: Nice buildings!!

name: Paul Hallmark
text: I rated Bama Sheds 5 out of 5 for a few reasons.  Bama Sheds is a true family owned built from the ground up local small business.  Jenny the office-customer service manager is an absolute pleasure to work with.  Jenny listened to what I was looking for and then helped me pick out and customize my building to what I need and was very patient when I changed things.  They were able to show me on a screen as we were customizing my building.  Also they are the absolute best value for a shed anywhere around north Alabama area.  The crew came out and built my shed and the quality of material and workmanship is second to none.  They exceeded my expectations by alot.  Thank you Jenny and the whole crew at Bama sheds, I appreciate you going the extra mile for me.  There really is no other place I would choose to build my shed.

name: Tina Doege
text: It was a wonderful. We just ordered our Pole Barn to be custom built by Bama Sheds. We are so excited! This all new to all of us! I believe this is the beginning of an awesome relationship!

name: Tina Fuller
text: They are so friendly and helpful. I had the exact shed I wanted in less than 20 minutes. Prices are great.

name: Brenda Cotney
text: These guys are awesome i love my new cabin

name: Dustin Anderson
text: I have never done a review but these guys are the real deal! From start to finish i never felt pressured. Very laid back people and professional. Was skeptical due to lower pricing than others but the quality I saw at their sales lot sold me and the onsite build option fit what I needed. Very impressed and highly recommend Bama sheds.

name: alonzo ross
text: I love my shed.

name: Leslie Pruitt
text: If you want Personable Service and Quality work from beginning to end of transaction, these are the people to go with for your portable storage buildings, tiny homes and forever home needs. We have had multiple buildings built by this Company who is a small town business, and we could not be more satisfied. The owner Definitely goes above and beyond and beats any competitors prices. Go with this company and you will not be disappointed.  Our original tiny home was built by another company and we have so regretted not going with BamaSheds with our original build, a much better experience with BamaSheds.

name: Stephen Bennett
text: By far the best in the Buisness! The office staff was extremely friendly and helpful in designing our building. The owner actually came out to our property and looked at the location of placement before delivery and was extremely nice and helpful. The building was built on time and delivered by an extremely professional and efficient field crew. We couldn’t be happier! Thank you Bama sheds and your entire crew from office to field. Y’all are without a doubt the best in the Buisness!!

name: Shawnmatthewman 2563417842
text: They had problems  getting the lumber here on time,  and the crew that came and built my work shop has no business building anything . The workmanship is horrible,  they are just in it for the money,  build as many has you can as fast as you can. Stay away from Bama sheds especially  if you are going to have it built  on site.

name: John Strange
text:
I don’t normally do reviews, but I love this new shed so much but I had to share the experience. Gary built the shed exactly to my specifications.   The quality of the work is incredible compared to other sheds that I priced and looked at during my search.
The shed was built within one week and could’ve been delivered the following week but I had not even taken ownership of the our home yet! The delivery and set up team were tremendous as well, and worked diligently until they had the shed leveled and placed exactly where I wanted it.
All in all, a tremendous job and a very positive experience all around. Gary is extremely helpful and will take care of any issues along the way. Great company.

name: Jared Palmer
text: Gary and his crew were amazing. They went above and beyond and I am so happy with my shed. There is a reason they have such good reviews they really deserve them.

name: John Hamlin
text: Excellent price great deal. The work on the shed is great.

name: Anna Daniel
text: These guys did an amazing job on our building. I’m so glad we went with bamasheds. I highly recommend them. I don’t think There’s anyway We would be this happy if we chose a different company. THANK YOU guys so much for wonderful building.

name: Nyla Lennon
text: Jenny was super nice we loved her energy! Definitely will be purchasing a shed!

name: Gus Knapp
text: Gary and his help did a great job. They were respectful around my wife no cussing and took time to do a very good job on placement of my building. Made sure I was happy before they left and cleaned up good. I would recommend them to anyone. Very pleased

name: Jeremy McCullars
text: These guys were great!! Rock solid sheds..very kind, friendly guys...let me know what was going on through the whole process...if you are needing a storage shed, give these guys a call, you won’t regret it!!

name: James Castleberry
text: Gary and the team at Bama Sheds did a great job with our 12X20 building.  Great quality and attention to detail.  Will use them again and highly recommend them for your standard or custom building needs.

name: Jeff Haynes
text: Gary and the crew are great. Friendly and accommodating.  They were able to build and deliver my building 3 days earlier than promised. The ordering/financing process was short and simple. And more reasonbly priced than several others I had looked at.

name: Jeff Elliott
text:
Gary and his team were great from working with us on the perfect size for our needs.  Ordering process was quick and my wife loved the extensive color selection.   Cash or Rent to Own (90 days same as cash too).  Down payment is affordable (1 month pymt)

Make the drive, you won't be sorry.

name: Oscar Earnest
text: Bama sheds did an awesome job on our new 16 x 32 man cave. Crew was very respectful and curteous. Helpful and always kept us in the loop every step of the way. Build was pretty fast. Never had to worry about our personal property. They were drug and alcohol free and it showed. Very professional! Thanks very much Gary Thompson and Shane and his crew. Y'all were the bomb!

name: Lauren King
text: Wonderful experience. Me and my dad were trying our best to figure out a storage solution for all of my stuff, definitely made the right choice here. Amazing service and got the shed delivered same day. I highly appreciate the service we received here.

name: Bonnie Clarkston
text: Brought a pre owned building from Bama Sheds.  Gary was great to work with.   Got our shed to us quickly.   We will now be working with them on a custom built building for our offices.   You can’t go wrong shopping here

name: Alecia Margiotta
text: The entire crew from bama sheds came out and did an awesome job! They all were very courteous and respectful! That's hard to find these days. My husband and I are two very happy people with the job that they did on our shed. It was a pleasure doing business with you Gary Thompson and Shane and your crew. Thanks once again from the bottom of our heart. You guys are the greatest!

resp.text: Thank you Alecia. We appreciate the business and hope you guys enjoy your building. Let us know if we can do anything else for you, your family or friends. Bama Sheds & Garages.

name: Grady Goodwin
text: Bama Sheds built my wife and I, a 20x26 garage. We couldn’t be happier with our new space. I would recommend Bama Sheds to anyone that needs a garage, storage building, etc. Gary was very attentive to the “wants” and the overall project. Rick Phillips did an outstanding job on the build. His attention to detail is awesome. These guys always made sure, that we were happy every step of the way.

name: Rhonda Varner
text: Great working with Gary and Rick. I love my building. Rick and his helper did a great job and were always on time. Thanks again guys!

name: Chris Taylor
text: Great customer service and very knowledgeable. Enjoyed the whole experience! The shed I got was outstanding quality at an affordable price. If you are looking to purchase a shed call Gary at Bama Sheds.

name: Lyn Lane
text: We are extremely happy with the quality of our building, the customer service was EXCELLENT! The turn around time was DAYS not weeks! I highly recommend Bama Sheds!

name: Michelle Pittman
text: I cannot day enough good things about this company and Gary in particular. Prompt to respond, on time, very reasonably priced with payment plans for every need. He built our barn/shed in plenty of time for my daughter’s Xmas mini horse. The quality is great and I will definitely use this company again!!

name: Christopher Cook
text: I absolutely love my shed. Excellent price and quality. The owner came out to match the paint with my house and couldn't be happier with the outcome!!!

name: Stephen Prickett
text: Great customer service.  The building looks great and it has really helped me clean my garage.

name: Cherell McKenzie
text: Just love it

name: Mike Morgan
text: I have a building from bama and they did a great job sitting it up

name: Chris Hamilton
text: Gary and his crew were very professional and we couldn't be happier with our Shed. They were on time and did outstanding quality work

name: Sandra Maw Maw Sweener
text: Love these guys ♥️💙❤️❤️

name: Stacy Brunner
text: Excellent customer service!

name: Nakeila Bedford
text: Very good people and reasonable price

name: Seth Tanner
text: They will build anything you want

name: Rachel Proctor
text: Highly recommend Bama Sheds, Gary was the best!!

name: Mr. Drywall
text: Good place

name: Jimmy Salter
text: Nice friendly people. Answered all questions and then some. Would reccomend them for truck accessories

resp.text: Thanks so much, Jimmy!  We hope to see you back soon!

name: Steve Dunlap
text: I spent $5000 on a shed, it showed up with some damage, things happen, I just wanted some touch up paint and a new panel.  It told almost 3 months to get the panel and some paint.  I had to call corporate to get anything done.  I stopped in to get the paint and Bill couldn't wait to run out.  I never received an apology or a  we're sorry.  I hope I don't need any warranty service because based on past service I'll never get any help.

name: Derral Upton
text: Excellent place to go for your truck needs! The staff is very helpful, and courteous! And fast! Did a great job. I'll always go there for any truck accessories.

resp.text:
Mr. Upton
Thank you for a wonderful review. We greatly appreciate your business

name: Dhee Pickens
text:
Friendly Helpfully & knowledge employees,  Without high pressure.  If you know what your looking for or want it's either there Or They can get it 💯
Very Professional experience service set up personal to make sure your building is not only set up but that it's  in your choice of placement & leveled
To your satisfaction, Before they leave, & go over your warenties with you before they leave . 😀
Most definitely the Most Competitive Prices Anywhere.!!!!!!!

resp.text:
Dhee,
Thank you very much for your business. We greatly appreciate you

name: AL
text: The staff was friendly and courteous and very professional. I enjoyed looking around the store while my truck was being worked on. I recommend anyone needing automotive accessories visit this store.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and confidence. We appreciate you.

name: chris gilliam
text: Do not reccomend! Spent 2 grand with these guys and I go in store to ask a question about a truck cap we purchased. Bill didnt speak and some kid answered my question. As I left bill was greeting customers coming in the door. Feel like they got our money and the hell with us. Wont be back!!!the kid didnt have a clue and bill was basically ignoring me.

name: Chad Thompson
text: Best experience!! Cheapest price! Beat amazons price by a mile! Best customer service! Will return!

resp.text: Mr. Thompson.  Thank you for great review and your business. We appreciate you.

name: Joseph Harrell
text: Hidden costs, last minute fees, incomplete service, and deceptively worded offers are what you will find. What ever the offered price expect to pay 20% more in the end when you shop here.

resp.text:
We are incredibly sorry that you did not receive the highest standard of customer care while dealing with us as a company. We strive to offer excellent customer service in all aspects of the purchasing process. While we do our very best to explain everything in detail, we do understand that from time to time there can be miscommunication between ourselves and the customer, and for this we are sincerely sorry. It is never our intention to mislead anyone in our advertisements and we do apologize that this was the impression that you received while doing business with us.
We would appreciate an opportunity to address your complaints, directly. Please stop in or call our Store Manager, Bill Brownell at (256) 383-2888. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: john cook
text: Outstanding service and highly pleased

resp.text: Mr. Cook, we are very happy that you are please with your new Carport. We greatly appreciate your trust and your business. Thank you

name: Richard J Kreutzer
text: Accessories for truck or RV what you need when you need it, Spa and Hot tubs too

name: Willie Patrick
text: Bill and his crew r the best second to no one!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Patrick. We greatly appreciate your business.

name: robert dupuis
text: Very pleased with purchase and the service. Had a truck bed cover installed. Everyone was great thanks for the great experience.

resp.text: Thanks Robert! We appreciate Your business!

name: James Baker
text: Verry nice people good prices

name: Bryson Jeffreys
text: Great Customer service. Very professional service will definitely do business with again.

resp.text: Thanks Bryson!  Come back and see us!

name: Jerry Anderson
text: Sorry can’t give a good review I told them what kind of vehicle I had was assured they could put electric brake control on it but after driving an hour to get there they tell me it can’t be done😢😢

resp.text: Jerry, we apologize for your negative experience. We tried every possibility of getting a brake controller to work on your vehicle. We would love the opportunity to install other accessories on your vehicle!

name: Bobbie Clemons
text: H&H made my she shed dream a reality with affordable pricing, great customer service and quick delivery & set up.

resp.text:
Mr. Clemons,

We are very happy you had a great experience. We greatly appreciate your business.

name: Rickey Streetman
text: Always very helpful

name: Andy Perry
text: These guys went above and beyond to help me out. Had an issue with my bed cover and they got it taken care of ASAP.  Ordered me a new one, called when it was in and installed it in no time. Do yourself a favor and check these guys out. They are the real deal and the service is second to none.

name: Nick Hall
text: I called the shop asking for prices and Jasper answered the phone. He had to call me back with a quote and labor for my truck which he did very quickly. There was a mishap in ordered the product which wasn’t this shops fault. Bill made sure to make everything right and has exceeded my expectations. I’m very pleased and will buy more from these guys!

resp.text: Nick, we are glad to have earned your repeated business. Thank you for this nice review. See you next time!

name: Ted Roberts
text: Had a hitch put on a 2019 Honda Accord Sport.... Mark & Jasper did a great job getting it done.  Excellent work....  Bill did a great job following up on customer service...  Would highly recommend them!

resp.text: We sure appreciate you and your business, Ted! Thanks for the great review.

name: Michael Norman
text: Recently moved to the area and I was impressed by the professional/friendly service.  The manager Bill is running a great business and I'm looking forward to doing more business with them in the future.

resp.text: Awesome!! Thank you for the great review, Michael. See you next time!

name: Bryant Mitchell
text: I purchased a PIT BARREL COOKER from H &H and the experience was AWESOME! Bill Brownell showed me the new product and  made the deal work. I even bought some accessories for the smoker. I have used it 4 times and could not be more pleased with it. It cooks between 265-295 consistantly. Chicken wings, Ribs, and Butts turned out great.

resp.text: The Pit Barrel Cookers really are awesome! We're glad to hear you're enjoying it. Thanks for the great review, Bryant!

name: Donald Cross
text: Great people and honest.

name: John Sparks
text: Excellent service

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Sparks. We appreciate your business

name: Tom Frost
text: Had a hitch installed on my 2017 Mustang. Great customer service, and SUPER reasonable. Try them...you'll be glad you did.

resp.text: We appreciate it, Tom!!

name: LaDarren X El-Bey
text: Very Friendly Staff. Manager Bill Brownell is a great guy!

resp.text: We think so, too 🙂 Thank you, LaDarren!

name: Donavan Blake
text: Great customer service and very professional with there installations. I would recommend you check this company out.

resp.text: We appreciate it, Donavan. Hope to do business with you again!

name: Mike Taylor
text: Great friendly staff good quality work best prices in the area.

name: Blane Williams
text: Excellent Customer Service & Installation. Keep trying to beat pricing!

resp.text: Blane, considering your kind words it looks like you may have meant to leave 5 stars? 1 being the lowest and 5 being the best (: Please correct this so it does not pull down our rating. We appreciate the kind words!

name: Steve Merry
text: Fast courteous service.

name: JAMES CARL SHEWBART JR
text: Very informative about camper shells

name: mitchell clifton
text: Great parts and service

resp.text: We appreciate it, Mitchell!

name: pamela rene smith-robinson
text: Great business!

resp.text: We appreciate it, Pamela!

name: John Phillips
text: Everytime I use H&H they treat you like family ...and can't wait until you come back !! A+ guys...

resp.text: Mr. Phillips, Thank you for your great comments. We greatly appreciate you and your continued business. We look forward to you coming back.

name: Graham McGalliard
text: Got them to do a spray-in bed liner on my truck. They did a fantastic job. No bubble or missed spots. They have great customer service. Enjoyed doing business with H&H

name: Desmond Brooks
text: Great group of guys at the Montgomery location. Very knowledgeable I've worked with Gray, Jordan, and Justin. I've gotten my truck leveled there and I've also gotten wheels and tires. Looking forward to them doing my lift kit in the future. Highly Recommend H&H.

resp.text: Thanks Desmond! That Ram is looking tough.  See you soon.

name: Dylan Lollar
text: shipping took a bit with everything being backed up,, but the team realized an issue with the particular piece I ordered  and immediately corrected and ordered the right part and got it to me. 10/10

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback Dylan.

name: Destyne Bazemore
text: The customer service from these guys is some of the best I have ever experienced. Travis and the team helped me with the build on my truck the entire way through and it turned out better than I expected. I highly recommend these guys for anything you need!

resp.text: Thanks for your business and the kind words Destyne. It’s always a joy to  work with customers like you. Let us know if you need anything at all.

name: crazy otto
text: I had them spray my bed liner for my gladiator. They done a great job. And the guys working there were very helpful and professional. I definitely will go back.

resp.text: Thank you for your business. Looking forward to adding more accessories to your Gladiator!!

name: phyllis atkinson
text: Great customer service!! Travis took time to show me the pools and explain everything. Just waiting on the installation guy. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thank you Miss Atkinson. Enjoy your new pool. Don’t forget, we test water at no charge. We hope to see you soon!!

name: Faye Fontenot
text: Will not visit this store again. If you want a pool with a fantastic price, go to Family Leisure in Birmingham.

resp.text: Hi Faye. We apologize for your negative experience with us. We had entry level pools at the beginning of the year. Unfortunately, we sold out of all of those models already. We have pools available currently but they are nicer pools with better warranties, and therefore, are not entry level priced. If we can be of any further assistance, please do not hesitate to call us.

name: George Alexander
text: A very likeable, capable & knowledgeable bunch of guys.  They do what they say, when they say & for how much. Quality products & service.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words George. This is what we strive for every time. We appreciate you sharing your positive experience. Let us know if you need anything.

name: Lagreta McClain
text: Best customer service I received in a long time.  My husband's truck had some minor rubbing after we had some wheels/tires installed elsewhere.   We called around some different places, but when we called and spoke with Gary he insisted we bring the truck so they could look at it, to make sure we knew exactly what was needed.  Appointment was quick within a few days; parts came in on time.  When I dropped the truck off everyone was courteous and very nice.  They called me to keep me updated on the work being done.   When I picked the truck up, the work was explained to me and asked if I had any questions.  I was very pleased with the work and the atmosphere.  I totally recommend H&H and will definitely do more business with them!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great feedback. We strive to have the best customer service in town, and we are excited you got a taste of that. Thanks for shopping with us! Come see us if you need anything at all in the future.

name: David Kiel
text: Very good service and professional installation of my K & N cold air intake on my truck. I recommend them to other truck owners.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Jon Johnson
text: The staff at H&H in Montgomery went above and beyond to make sure I was happy with my purchases. I bought a Class III hitch, a set of 18” XD wheels and a J-Spec 3.5” lift kit for my 2020 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sahara. From helping me find the perfect accessories to providing expert installation they did everything right. Travis in Sales provided his vast knowledge of Jeep products to help me find exactly what I was looking for then he worked to provide the best possible price. Gary and his staff at the store were very helpful in answering all my questions and making sure I was happy with the installation. I highly recommend H & H for all your Jeep or truck accessories!!

resp.text: Thanks Jon. It was a pleasure working with you to find the right products for your needs. We appreciate your business and your kind words. We couldn’t do what we do without great customers like yourself!!!

name: Christopher Pollard
text: Got in got a great deal on a camper for my truck and was out in less than 30 Minutes. Excellent service.

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Pollard. Glad we had what you were looking for. Enjoy that camper shell!!

name: Sharon Davis
text: Good quality products at a fair price and friendly service representatives.

resp.text: Thank you Sharon!!

name: Loren Jackson
text: Great service  . . .friendly outfit . . nuff said

resp.text: Thank you Loren. We appreciate your business, as well as your feedback.

name: Carl Mosley
text: The guys had great customer service and they always do an awesome job with installation.

resp.text: Thank you Carl!

name: Patrick Perdue
text: Very high priced place. Not competitive at all. Go across the street to Bazzells. But friendly enough.

resp.text: Hi Patrick. We are saddened to hear that you had a negative experience at our store. We would like to know specifically what you feel is high priced as we sell everything at internet price and only charge labor for installation in accordance to manufacturer provided labor times. Please reach out to our district manager, Travis Hughes, so we can clearly understand your complaint. He can be reached at 205-917-7194 or by email at travis.hughes@hhsales.com. Thank you for your feedback.

name: X Smith
text: These guys are awasome professionals. I thought I would save some money and order my winch online and I did. When the winch finally came in I couldnt find anyone to put it on but these guys took the challenge. Everyone else wanted to give that song and dance "If you dont buy it from us we cant help you".  My son and I were even going to try to this job but the bumper and winch were just to heavy for us to handle. The crew at H&H did a fantastic job. Thanks again H&H.

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Smith. It’s great to hear we had the solution you were searching for. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Michael Howze
text: Great customer service, friendly staff and great work on my truck. The place to go for truck accessories.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Michael, and thanks for the review.

name: Gene Faulkner
text:
Went to H&H last week, and I honestly can’t say how the service was because no one would come outside to help me.

Buildings looked ok, nothing to write home about. Overall, I cannot recommend this company.

resp.text: Hi there. While we are very sorry for your negative experience, we wish you would have walked into our store and asked someone for assistance. Our goal is to help every customer on a first come first served basis. While you were out looking at buildings, our staff members were assisting other customers in the store as well as on the telephone. We have ordered signs to put on our lot to let future customers know to step inside if no one comes out. Hopefully this will eliminate any unsatisfying experiences in the future. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Paco P
text: Was good experience , Gary was very helpfull, He give me all the information I need it

resp.text: Thanks!! We appreciate the feedback.

name: Jeeper Dad 5000
text: Go see Jordan at the Montgonery location. Very knowledgeable and helped me out on my jeep.

resp.text: Thanks for your business. We are proud to have Jordan on our team. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Robin Bradford
text: The Manager Gary & all of the guys at H&H were very helpful & courteous while installing my back-up camera. They were knowledgeable about what needed to be done! THANKS

name: Berrey Art
text: I had an Undercover Flex Cover ordered & installed on my truck by H&H.  Gary was very helpful, and the staff had it installed within 20 minutes.  Great customer service, very helpful, highly recommend!

resp.text: Hey Brandon, We love hearing such positive feedback from our customers! We are so glad that you're happy with your purchase.

name: Nita Johnson
text: I was very impressed with the customer service! I was overwhelmed with the quality of the sprayed in bed liner!

resp.text: Thanks Nita. We appreciate your business. We look forward to seeing you again soon!!

name: Terrence Coleman (tcoleman701)
text: Awesome experience and very professional interactions with the knowledgeable staff. No pressure to buy and there was wide array of items to choose from, (I was looking for and ultimately chose a 10x16 storage shed), the process was seamless and fluid. I will return to purchase other items they offer in the future. I highly recommend this exceptional business and the outstanding people that work there!

resp.text: That's fantastic, Terrence! Thank you for the great review. We look forward to business with you in the future!

name: Kenneth Zeigler
text: The customer service is wonderful.!!  I have a Leer bed cover (I didn't purchase from them), that I couldn't get unlocked, they unlocked it and adjusted the lock so it wouldn't happen again!  they take care of their customers.

resp.text: Kenneth, we are happy to help! Thank you for the nice review. Come back and see us!

name: Christa Harris
text: I had a great experience. Jon and Scott worked very hard to get my storage building set up, exactly where I wanted it. They were very friendly and professional. I would recommend them to anyone. Great job guys. Thanks again!!!’ 5 stars!!!

name: Tracy Groover
text: We just bought a storage shed and Jon and Scott with H&H delivered and set up the building.  They did a fantastic job.  They went above and beyond to get the building in the area where we wanted it.  We even looked at a secondary location but Jon and Scott were determined to get it in the exact spot of our first choice!  Great job!

name: Ray Dutton
text: Great products and people!

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Dutton. We appreciate the feedback.

name: Jerry Delrie
text: Sorry it took to long to review but the more i step in my man cave. I got to respect the guy.Jon and that guy Scott I wanted to say. Theses guy took care of business.  If I was a owner on a store. Aka I was one. But that Jon got the it factor. Scoot he is a great worker. I just see a whole lot of potential in Jon. I see good things in Scoot.They are both great GUYS. They came back and help my storage be a better Building. I know I sound Highly on Jon. It is just be cause I guess he sold me my building inside when I got my building. He sold it to me. He was very Helpful in me picking out that one. But what blew me away he deviled it with in a week. This guys a great sells man and a hell of a building guy who will keep his word.Great job for the help and Scott. Scoot did a fine job . But all in all I GIVE IT 500 STARS. I will past the word on H and H. I do tell you one thing you got to fine young men. I will be looking for outer one soon. Thank for all involved.

name: Jackie Sexton
text: Great selection for all ur needs

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback!! Hope to see you again soon.

name: Jay Mack
text: A great place to shop. This place is the best kept secret. I will be purchasing more truck products from in the future, I love the variety.

name: CT H
text: Great customer service and their prices cannot be beat.  I called around and they had the best price by far.  Scheduled my appt and was finished in less than an hour with a new bed cover and vent visors.  Will definitely go back when I need anything else.

resp.text: That's awesome, Todd! Thanks for the great review! We look forward to business with you in the future.

name: Patrick Janigen
text: I would be more than happy to give this review because Jon &Scott went above and beyond to deliver my storage shed. They help me move two disabled cars that were blocking access to the back yard. They work in a down pour rainfall but they didn't stop until they were finish. I want to say thanks guys sorry you got soak.

name: Mike Urquhart
text: I was not satisfied with the quality of the truck products I purchased through H&H. After having expressed my disappointment, however, they removed the after-market parts and provided me a full refund.  While not the best shopping experience I have ever had, H&H took the time to make it right.  All in all; a no harm, no foul experience.

name: Jonathon Strickland
text: Great place to shop , will definitely be going back for more truck accessories

resp.text: Thank you for your business, we really appreciate it.

name: Adrian landry
text: I went in looking for a bed cover for my new truck. The salesman went in depth and explained the differences & pros and cons with the covers they offered. They didn't try to force me to buy a certain one & really made the whole experience very pleasant. They worked with me to get it installed on my off day later on in the week. Great service. Great product. Good people.

resp.text: Thanks Adrian, come back and see us soon!

name: Lesley Wilkinson
text: Recently bought a storage shed from H and H.  We shopped around and found the best value for our money here.  Customer service was great.  They had to work with us on delivery because the place we needed our shed was down a hill and the land had to be dry or truck wouldn’t make it out.  Rain delayed us a couple of times and then actually the first time they brought it they couldn’t get it down drive because we had to take some tree limbs out before they could get truck in....  it was a long process but they were patient.  They did an awesome job when all the pieces fell into place.  John and the other guy (sorry I forgot his name) threaded the eye of a needle putting this 12 x 20 shed where we wanted it .  they worked hard to put it where we wanted it, a  tight fit on a slope in between a lot of trees....  can’t say enough about these guys and the back breaking work they did that day ....

resp.text: Glad it finally worked out, Leslie! We hope you'll be back for another great deal. Thank you for the nice review!

name: Greg Carr
text: They went above and beyond the call of duty in helping me order and then replacing the step pads on my step bar. They could have easily just tried to sell me new step bars, but choose the honorable way.

resp.text: Greg, that's us! (: Glad we could get your bars fixed up. Come back and see us!

name: steven
text: THE GUYS THERE DID A AWESOME JOB ON LOWERING MY TRUCK ...GREAT PLACE TO DEAL WITH !!!!

name: Frank Harrison
text: Friendly  customer service

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Will O'Connor
text: They have a good selection of products at competitive pricing. Most importantly though, they have a very friendly and knowledgeable staff. They even came out in a rainstorm to help me get my truck out of the mud when I got stuck near their store. And that was before I was ever a customer!

resp.text: We're a people company and were happy to help ya Will! If you have a store full of winches you might as well pull one out every now and again!

name: Jennifer Pemberton
text: Great experience dealing with Gary Stone at H&H.  Wide variety of products available in store, personalized service, and very knowledgeable.  All of the staff was helpful and courteous.  It was nice to do business where people appreciate your business.

resp.text: We certainly do! Gary is one of our best and does a great job, thank you for the kind words!

name: Devan Gipson
text: Recently brought a storage unit. Jon and Scott were very good and very supportive in delivering the unit. I enjoyed the experience. Give thise guys more money.

resp.text: Devan, we are so glad you had a great experience with H&H! Thank you for the nice review.

name: Roscoe
text: Excellent place to buy from.  Recently purchased a A.R.E. camper shell. Fast install and excellent service after the purchase.  Everyone is very friendly and helpful. Excellent assortment of truck accessories.

resp.text: Thank you Kirk! We do our best to make our customers happy!

name: George Ingols
text:
Good place to shop for truck accessories. 3rd time there, satisfied every time
Nice staff, efficient service

resp.text: We sure appreciate your business, George! Thank you for the kind review. We will see you soon when those seat covers arrive!

name: Paul Morton
text: I have shopped here several times, once for a small item and the other for a more significant purchase.  Regardless of sales price I was helped quickly and knowledgeably.

resp.text: Thanks for the nice review, Paul! We hope you will be back to see us.

name: Brian Cook
text:
A Definite Thumbs Up!

I don't often write reviews, but felt compelled to do so after my recent experience with H&H Home & Truck Accessory Center, here in Montgomery.

I called the store and spoke with Gary, an H&H District Manager. He was very personable on the phone, and after I explained my problem regarding the soft tonneau cover (that I had purchased elsewhere) on my truck, he suggested that I drive down to the store and he would take a look at it.

Upon my arrival, he introduced himself to me, and we walked out to the parking lot so he could inspect the cover. He diagnosed the problem in about a minute, and started repairing it himself right on the spot.

In less than 30 minutes, he had it fixed as new. Then, when I offered to go settle the bill in the office, he refused to take any payment for his efforts. I practically begged him to let me pay something, but he merely asked that I remember them the next time I start thinking about getting a new truck accessory.

This kind of service is rare in today's world, and I can easily recommend H&H Home & Truck Accessory Center in Montgomery.

resp.text: Thank you so much! That's the kind of service we strive for, customer loyalty is our number one goal!

name: Michael R. White
text: Nice sales person allowed me to look at storage sheds without hovering.  Gave me details when finished.  They don't handle nitto tires at this location, got to go to Pelham for tires.  Helpful staff.

resp.text: Unfortunately, only a few of our stores are set up for wheels and tires right now. We appreciate the nice review, Michael! Hope you will come back and see us for a building!

name: oliver fitzpatrick
text: I've always had good experiences when dealing with the staff at H & H.  I would recommend them for any truck accessories needs.

resp.text: Oliver, that is great news! We sure appreciate it. Thank you for the review!

name: Tim Enfinger
text: I stopped by on my lunch break to get a cost and then schedule the gasket replacement for my ARE fiberglass lid. They were able to work me in right then, and within 30 mins, DONE. Highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Wow! Glad we were able to get you fixed up so quickly! Thanks for the review, Tim. Come back and see us!

name: Thomas Womble
text: Went in for warranty. Great  service. Prompt and courteous.

resp.text: Fantastic. Thank you for the review, Thomas!

name: Tommy Grantham
text: The guys did an excellent job on my truck thanks Gary

resp.text: Thank you, Tommy! Come back and see us.

name: Annie Cantrell
text: Great customer service and friendly. Very knowledgeable about the products.

resp.text: Thanks Annie! Come back and see us.

name: Jenna Bozeman
text: Great prices and GREAT customer service from my phone to going in the store!  Will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer, we're happy to help!

name: Kyle Jones
text: Friendly staff, very helpful and reasonably priced! Definitely would recommend!!

resp.text: We appreciate it, Kyle! Come back and see us.

name: Lonnie Creel
text: In-and-out fast friendly And helps you anyway they can

resp.text: Thanks Lonnie! That's what we strive for.

name: Jerry Delrie
text: They place my building exactly where I wanted it and was very kind and courtesy.  Great job.

resp.text: Glad to hear it, Jerry! Thanks for the nice review!

name: Seth Mueller
text: Good prices, excellent staff, very friendly!!

name: chris taylor
text: Very rude and unhelpful!!

resp.text: Chris, we are disappointed to hear this. Please reach out to Travis Hughes at 205-917-7194. He is the district manager for the Montgomery store. We would like to discuss the details of your experience so we can take the appropriate action to prevent this from happening to you or anyone in the future.

name: Nicole Andress
text: Great prices and customer service

resp.text: Thanks Nicole! Come back and see us.

name: LNMN “RedMustang” Joye
text: running boards installed by H&H...great job

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you for the review!

name: Sue Macko
text: Really love this store and the people who work there.

resp.text: Thank you, Sue! Come see us soon.

name: Philip Pruitt
text: Great job very friendly

resp.text: Thank you, Philip!

name: nathan jenkins
text: They didn't have the two items I needed, but were very helpful in ordering from a sister shop.

resp.text: Thanks Nathan, we will look at updating our inventory levels! Thanks for the feedback!

name: Joan Kelly
text: My husband got a storage building from H&H with the help of Trevor.  Jon and Scott just delivered and set it up in the spot we selected.  They could not have done a better job! Thanks!!

name: Robert Tigue
text: Professional

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Milton Turney
text: The ribs were delicious.

name: donald TURNER
text: I absolutely love the shed. The quality and appearance of the shed beats all competitors. I have nothing but praise for those 2 points. However,  I do think Tuff shed should add additional staff to better accommodate customers. It took 2 months to get my shed installed after my purchase. Quite simply, I feel that is unacceptable. The installer did a great job overall when the installation was completed but 2 months is too long to wait for an 8’ x 12’ shed.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that you're happy with your new shed, Donald and we do apologize for the delay. As we do have longer than usual lead times currently, we appreciate your patience.

name: Ryan Rebowe
text: Ed and the team at Tuff Shed were great from start to finish. Very professional. Worked very hard to get our shed installed on its designated date despite some road blocks. Installers worked meticulously to make sure all was up to our specifications and what we wanted. Would definitely recommend them.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that, Ryan. Thank you for choosing to work with our team here at Tuff Shed Mobile for your new shed.

name: michael seals
text:
Great, quality product.  Delivery and installation went quite well.  Sales and management included periodic updates during the process.

I would do this again!!

resp.text: We're glad to hear that, Michael. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Ben W.
text: Much better! Long story short is it started off pretty rough but ended well. The original installers did a less than sub-par job with craftsmanship. After sending Tuff Shed photos of the “finished” product, they sent a different team of carpenters back and corrected about 99% of the problems created by the first crew. The management in place there seems to care about repeat business. They made it right, and are standing by their end of the deal. Special thanks to Sarah and Tasha!!!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review, Ben. Thank you for giving our team an opportunity to make this right. We hope you enjoy putting your shed to good use for years to come.

name: tony dughaishjjijjg
text:
Excellent service on time the manager are very helpful and professional don't go any where else
The installation crew very polite and on time
Over all experience was excellent 👌

resp.text: We're glad to hear that! Thank you for choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile.

name: Andrew Sanders
text: Go to the location and see Ed to get your work ordered and done. He will make sure you get exactly what you need for the right price.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review, Andrew.

name: walter crawford
text:
Ed was extremely helpful, discussed several options and cost.  He explained the warranty and what to expect on the day of installation.

Was originally quoted a  delivery of 60 + days, was surprised when Tuff Shed  called and schedule the installation within 30 days.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Walter and we appreciate you choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile. We hope you enjoy your new shed.

name: Patrick Partin
text: Ed was very professional and helpful when helpful when helping me design my shed.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Patrick. Thanks for choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile.

name: Alicia Robertson
text: Had an excellent experience! Our sales rep Bobby was extremely knowledgeable of all the options available and navigated the website seamlessly! She did not pressure at all, gave us a quote, and left the decision to us. After purchase, the install was flawless and after several rain storms, there have been NO issues at all! I would highly recommend Tuff Shed if you are looking for a quality storage building with no hassles!

resp.text: We're glad to hear that your new building is working well for you, Alicia. Thanks for taking the time to leave our team a review.

name: John Radford
text: Great food and good location in DFW airport.

name: Matt Yawn
text: Ed Adams has been a pleasure to deal with. I built my shed online and within 24 hrs Ed had called me to answer any questions I had. He has also been very responsive through text/email throughout the build process. Couple more weeks until install but so far I could not ask for a better experience! Thanks Ed

resp.text: We were happy to help every step of the way, Matt. Thank you for choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile and for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Ross Maritime
text: The sale staff "Bobbie H." was exceptional as well as the management "Charlie P." They came out to look at the location to ensure what i wanted would fit and provided me with the best options for my site. The set up was on time and very professional. The building looks great and fit my site perfectly. I Highly recommend Tuff Shed Mobile if your in need of additional storage or usable space.

resp.text: We were happy to help you get set up with a great Tuff Shed building, Ross. We hope you enjoy putting your new shed to good use for years to come.

name: D Jones
text:
Our sales representative, Bobbie Hebert, was extremely knowledgeable and took the time to walk us through the the options available, sizing, and pricing to fit our needs and budget,  She helped us understand the purchasing process and kept everything simple. We appreciated her attention to detail!

Our installer, Chris Crowther, arrived when he was scheduled and worked very hard to get our Tuff Shed built.  He talked with us about positioning and how the Shed would be strapped down. We appreciated Chris' attention to detail and recommendations!

Our Tuff Shed just went through Hurricane Sally as it went through Daphne. It took the wind and rain like a champ. It stayed positioned solid on the pad and dry inside. We took forward to years of happy use.

This is our 2nd Tuff Shed. We purchased a unit while living in Arizona and used it for the 8 years we lived in the house.  It was as solid the day we moved as when it was built, thus supporting our decision to purchase our 2nd Tuff Shed.

Thanks also to Quinten Norphleet for his communications regarding the status and delivery of our Tuff Shed.  We appreciated his attention o detail!

name: Jeff Cabana
text: Bobbie Hebert assisted me with exceptional knowledge and very professional and real time guidance. I was able to purchase my new Tuff Shed with the configuration that i needed. Bobbie is an awesome person that knows her stuff  about the Tuff Shed Products. Thanks for the great and personal support.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Jeff. Thank you for taking the time to leave our team a review, we appreciate it.

name: Judah Banks
text: The best place to buy a shed it made a good man cave Charlie was the best to make it happen for me

name: Wendell Rankin
text: Bobbie Hebert is absolutely awesome. Her professionalism was really on point. I would definitely recommend Tuff Shed. 5 stars

resp.text: We're glad to hear that. Thanks for leaving us a review.

name: April Thrasher
text: Very upset with my purchase of our Tuff Shed since we have never received it, or received a call, email, text or any kind of response from this company about our shed being delivered.  We have called, left messages, sent emails, through the Home Depot where we purchased it and the Tuff Shed company in Mobile to no avail. Terrible customer service!  Do not buy this product, go for a Graceland shed instead, I REALLY WISH WE HAD!!!  Let me repeat, we still haven't even received it or a call about scheduling the delivery!!  Paid over $3000 over 10 days ago!

resp.text: We're sorry to hear about the issues you've experienced with the delivery of your building and our team will do what we can to help make this right. Please email our National Support Team at ccare@tuffshed.com with the name the order was placed under and a good contact number to reach you. Our team will be in touch as soon as possible to help.

name: Nicolas Orleans
text: When you go, ask for Bobbie Hebert. She was amazing. Knowledgeable about all products, patient and took time to make sure we got exactly what we wanted.

resp.text: Thanks for talking the time to leave us a review, Nicolas. We appreciate it.

name: Randy Dorman
text: Bobbie was so helpful and very personable. She made the purchasing process very easy. Her knowledge and professionalism are beyond reproach.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that, Randy. Thanks for taking the time to leave our team a review.

name: T F
text: We had shed installed on 4/2/20. It was not installed correctly, and the installation was not complete. We have been trying to get someone to come back out to fix the issue since that day and we are not getting  a response. And they want to send us a document to esign to say installation is complete. We aren't signing anything until someone comes to fix the installation and actually complete it. Very unprofessional and we are not happy with this company. The sales rep in our area is the only one who will respond or offer any help, but he can't complete the installation. We understand that things may be delayed during this time, but at least contact us and give us a date/time someone will come out. We have an empty shed that is doing us no good.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that and we apologize for the delay in reply. We want to be certain that you're happy with the finished building and our service. If you do have any further concerns, please do email our team at ccare@tuffshed.com with the details and a good contact number to reach you. Our team will do what we can to help.

name: Leah Stephens
text: Amazing employees that get the job done and get the job done right!! Very courteous guys that work in shop. The ladies up front are kind and knowledgeable about the sheds and the options.

name: wolf pressburger
text: Shed is great! Warranty service is non existent. 😣

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that and our team will do what we can to help. Please email our National Support Team at ccare@tuffshed.com with the details of the issue, the name the order was placed under, and a good contact number to reach you. Our team will be in touch as soon as possible to help.

name: Steve
text: Bobbie was great to work with and very helpful in completing my order.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Steve. Thanks for taking the time to leave our team a review.

name: Tina Lacoste
text: Awesome place to look when your considering a tiy house project.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us a review, Tina. We appreciate it.

name: Larry Miller
text: Makes space easy

name: Roy Hollie
text: Excellent customer service from salesman Eddie Hinote who assisted with me selecting the perfect building for my needs.  Installation crew was professional and arrived on time.  I could not have had a better experience with the whole process.

name: Helan Coleman
text: Good customer service impresses us all but exceptional customer service is worth sharing with others so I felt compelled to share that Eddie with Tuff Shed went way far and beyond to work with me on my project which consisted of several challenges and I was beyond impressed by his professionalism and personal attention given to my situation. If you are buying a shed he’s the guy!

name: Carolyn Stewart
text: The build on site experience is best missed along with a custom build. Lots of promises, smiling faces and very little follow through. Six weeks in and still no roof, windows or doors. Rain has been an issue for sure but working for three to five hours once a week is unacceptable.

name: Carol Hancock
text: Sales man was very nice and informative. Delivery was quick and very professional. I love my shef.

name: Chris Stanley
text: Over priced. DIY bigger, better, cheaper.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that, Chris. We work hard to ensure the price of our buildings accurately reflect the product quality, service, and warranty included.

name: Joni Euler
text: If you are looking for an outdoor building, Tuff Shed is the answer. Eddie Hinote did an outstanding job of bringing my vision of a "she shed" to a finished product. After a 2-day build, the professional construction crew departed with no evidence that a construction project had even taken place. Tuff Shed provides many choices of buildings, windows, doors, colors, etc. and the customer can design the building to fit their needs-unlike pre-fab buildings. Thanks to Tuff Shed-Mobile for my perfect  crafting workshop.

name: Allan Kerley
text: They  need  to  work  on  their  customer  service.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that, Allan and we'd like to learn more about your experience so we can better improve our service in the future. Please email our National Support Team at ccare@tuffshed.com with the details and a good contact number to reach you. Our team will do what we can to help.

name: Lisa B. Howard
text: Eddie at Tuff Shed was wonderful to work with in all aspects from the beginning to the end of my shed experience.

name: Colby Jackson
text: Eddie knows his stuff. Enjoyed working with him!

name: Bob Kelly
text: Very overpriced buildings. Did not get a good vibe about this place. I shopped elsewhere and got a great deal on a very well built building, and it was delivered in 2 days!

resp.text: Hi Bob, we're sorry to hear that our first impression wasn't our best. Congratulations on finding the right building for your needs and if you're ever in the market for another building in future, we hope you'll give us a second chance.

name: Ashton Jackson
text: Go see Eddie for your shed needs! He will NOT disappoint!

name: Jill Clair Gentry
text: Absolutely horrible experience. Salesman doesn't know what he is doing and permitting is a nightmare. Overpromised, underdelivered the entire way. Do NOT use Tuff Shed.

name: Thomas Moynihan
text: Not much available on display outside, but overall good space and availability of products.

name: Milton Turney
text: Good product

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Lucas Bedia
text: Eddie really knows his sheds.

name: Brandon Buxton
text: I am very pleased with my new shed install and the overall experience with Tuff Shed. Ed with Tuff Shed was very helpful with the whole process. Only one small hiccup which was quickly resolved.

resp.text: We were happy to help, Brandon and we appreciate you choosing to work with our team at Tuff Shed Mobile.

name: Bonnie Wood
text: Wonderful experience.   I have an older vehicle and they never missed a beat, made the appointment and kept it on time and I am happy as can be.   Thanks guys!!!

name: Brenda McCombs-Stephens
text: Friendly staff. Not pushy at all. Very easy to do business with.

resp.text: We appreciate it, Brenda! Come back and see us.

name: Ricky St John
text: I had a appointment and they were very precise on my appt time. I had rain gaurds and walking boards put on my truck and I am very pleased with the prices and the install. I recommend anyone to go to H&H for any of your vehicle needs.

name: Ronnie Dickey
text: Pool was a good deal, but was told i could leave it there until a certain date prior to install. Once the pool came in i had to pick it up within a few days.

name: James Gray
text: Great Customer Service!!! They always are willing to help the customer.

name: Brian Mcdowell
text: Roger is awesome best transaction I've had in a long time I will definitely be purchasing all accessories for my wifes jeep from h&h of gadsden

name: christopher colley
text: These guys know what there doing, I’ve bought a spa and had a lift kit installed and no regrets. They have my business for a long time.

name: Glen Morton
text: Friendly, questions were answered in a timely manner. Great place to shop....

name: John Gramling
text: Good price and helpful staff, I recommend this business.

name: Lisa Stuelp
text: Great service and install

name: Bart Condray
text: Great products and services

name: Sam Bone
text: I bought my truck bed cover from these guys. At one point it broke. these guys fixed it very quickly and made it as easy as possible for me. Couldn't recommend them enough

name: Gabble G Girl Snell
text: I was very impressed by the dedication of the staff. I took my Toyota Tacoma truck by to have them add the electrical plug for my trailer hitch. They went over it and said there were two types. They ordered one, but when it came in, it wasn’t the right one. I was very impressed by their honesty in telling me the truth. They apologized and said they would be glad to get the right one if I would allow them. While they were evaluating it though, they discovered that the trailer hitch was not properly mounted. I watched them fix it, and they didn’t charge me for fixing it. They installed the right one the next day and I was very satisfied. Thanks Clint and crew.

name: Robert Redding
text: Great folks to do business with

name: Gary Davidson
text: Great professional customer service.  Very knowledgable and not pushy with sales. Very personable as well! Great staff!!

name: Miley Stansell
text: My entire family use the Gadsden store for all their truck accessorie needs. Great employees!

name: Tommy Robertson
text: Roger an Clint were very professional and helpful. Seem to be very honest people good to deal with.

resp.text: We'd have to agree (: Thanks Tommy! Come back and see us.

name: John Jennings
text: Great place. Roger is very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the nice review, John! We appreciate your business.

name: Wesley Hall
text: I am highly disappointed with H and H as a whole... I called and set up an appointment through corporate to have a hitch and wiring harness installed on our Jeep Oatriot. The gadsden store was closest to me. Christian tried to set me up an 8:00 a:m appt. but I could not make it so he set me up for 10:30 a:m.... I clarified that these items were in stock at the store. He said yes they are... so I call this morning at 8:30 a:m this morning to verify my appt... I get a call at 9:30 telling me that oops, we don’t have your parts here and are waiting on them to come in on our truck!!! They should be here about 11:30 or so!!!!!!!!!! I took of work  for half a day to have this installed... now it’s gonna cost me a whole day... why make an appt if this is how you are treated? It’s crazy and very frustrating!!! As well as costly....to lose a whole day of work

resp.text: Wesley, we do sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. H&H has discounted your purchase and hopes you will give us another chance in the future!

name: Janis S. Glispy
text: I visited your store & was impressed with the helpful employees, the products & will visit often.  I recommend your store to any person that needs truck or pool products.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Janis! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Johnny Mccurry
text: Done great work and really easy to work with, all's good

resp.text: That's great to hear, Johnny! We appreciate it.

name: Matt C
text: Great service even when they don’t make a dollar. If I come through again I will be coming back here for for sure!

resp.text:
That's great, DJ! You can visit our website, at hhsales.com, to find a location hopefully near you.
Thank you for the review! We hope to do business with you in the future.

name: Magan Sheets
text: Very knowledgeable and helped me with a gift I was looking for.

name: Michael Hines
text: Great place to buy accessories for your truck or car.

name: Wade Lackey
text: Great service, great prices and awesome employees

name: John Dillard
text: Purchased a camper shell for my tacoma, color was matched perfect also got my bug shield and window weather guards great fit!

resp.text: John, thanks for the feedback! Come back and see us soon!

name: Cathy England
text: Very helpful staff!!  Helped me to purchase a gift I was looking for!! Thank you!!

name: Joe Veal
text: They had what I needed for my truck.I would recommend them for your truck and trailer needs.

resp.text: Yep, we have it all! Thanks Todd. Come back and see us!

name: joan White
text: Good customer service

resp.text: Thank you, Joan!

name: John Link
text: Great Christian business

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, John. We hope you are enjoying your new Dream Maker Spa! See you next time.

name: Liza McRae Bishop
text: Super helpful staff

name: Chester Steele
text: Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks for the great rating, Chester!

name: John Blackmon
text:
Great accessories
Great staff
Great price
Great service
Thanks
